metadata.dc:author: García Corujo, J
Ramos Polo, E
Mencía Fernández, C
López Sastre, J
Diéguez Junquera, A
Roza, M
metadata.dc:description: Authors report a ten years old girl with mixed connective tissue disease. Diagnosis was based on clinical and serological findings. They stress good response to corticoid therapy and presence of recurrent parotitis.
metadata.dc:title: Enfermedad mixta del tejido conectivo. A propósito de un caso.
[Mixed connective tissue disease. Apropos of a case].
